Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you remembered my birthday! Thanks, ! That's really ni--
...*sniff*...*sniff*... what is that smell?
... What is this...?
Oh, you remembered my birthday! Thanks, ! That's really nice of you.
0.5Wow, it's beautiful! This color makes me think of all the spiritual power within the forest... Can you feel that wood energy?
0.5Thank you! I'm gonna put this under my pillow, and hopefully I'll dream about the ocean.
0.5Oh, this is perfect... I've been feeling a little sluggish lately. Rubies are great for energizing the spirit!
0.5Ah, an amethyst! This will protect me on those late nights working at the Saloon.
0.5The warm, soothing energy of this stone helps us re-center our thoughts... It's actually just what I needed on a day like this. Thanks!
0.5Ooh, it's jade! This is supposed to attract wealth... And who couldn't do with a few extra coins in the pocket?
Wow, thank you! I've heard that if you drink this before bed you'll have vivid dreams.
Oh, good, it's still warm... Poor thing, where's it's mother? *Whisper* ...I'll be your mother, don't worry... Poor baby.
I'm glad you gave this to me, . I'll take very good care of it.
B...But I thought we had a special bond... *sniff*
has a big smile on her face.
We're going to have a lot of fun together, I just know it.
... You broke my heart... I just can't talk to you anymore.
Please, let me try to heal...
Haley is too proud to be heartbroken over the divorce... Or at least to show it.
Thank you!
Um... Okay. Sorry you didn't like it. I guess those three years of practice were a complete waste...
Did you really think so? That's exactly the effect I was shooting for!
I'm so glad you liked it.
My outing with Clint was pretty fun!
Although, he spilled a root beer all over himself within ten minutes of getting there, and then barely said a word the rest of the night.
Have you ever tried cooking without a recipe? It's kind of liberating.
And who knows... you might discover something amazing!
I won't forget our camping trip any time soon...
Hey, I saw you at Sam's show. It was fun!
The city smelled pretty bad, though.
Nothing is more sad than an injured animal...
Hello . I had a feeling I'd be seeing you today.
Well, fall is here. Time to plant some new crops, huh?
bus#I'm visiting Sandy today. We're best friends!
I'm really happy that the bus is repaired.|*Sigh*... If only that old bus were fixed, I would've visited my friend Sandy today...
Another beautiful fall day.
It's a pity it'll soon be over.
Smell that clean air? It's lovely, isn't it?
I just fear that the Joja Co.'s of the world will take this away from us.
It's good weather for a picnic, isn't it?
If I didn't have to work I'd suggest we go on a nice picnic!
Keep your mind open and some interesting things might take root.
Anyway, how is your day going?
I don't have any huge plans for life. I prefer not to stress about the future.
Nothing like a sunny Sunday to lift the spirits!
You're such a nice person, ! Thanks for being my friend.
There's so many invisible barriers holding us back. Why can't people learn to let go and explore their true potential?
Me? Well, you know what they say... 'You can't cage a wild Junimo'.
Are you friends with Clint? He's a nice guy, if you get to know him.
He gets lonely working in his shop all day. But he's so shy he has trouble making new friends.
I think Clint's mad at me. He never looks at me anymore...
I always thought we were friends.
Hello. Did you have a good summer?
Hi ! I bet your farm did great this past summer, huh?
You're an excellent farmer.
My friend runs a shop in the desert. If you ever go there stop in and say hi for me.
I think she sells some rare products.
Yes, I'd love to dance with you, !
Now I'm excited... This is going to be a lot of fun!
Of course, my love. I've been looking forward to this!
I'm very sorry... but I've already agreed to dance with someone else.
Ah, spring. The season of pastels. I actually prefer jewel tones, myself.
Oh, excuse me! I was mumbling about fashion again, wasn't I?
There must be a meaning behind this... Nature is trying to tell us something.
What, though? I can't tell... It's hard to read. I feel a strong presence, though...
Can you feel it? The forest is singing! The trees are dancing with joy!
Ooh!... I can read it on your face. You're going to love it here in Pelican Town.
If you're ever looking for something to do in the evening, stop by the saloon. That's where I work!
That was a beautiful wedding... I'm really happy for you and Haley!
Well, now that you're married, I assume Shane won't be coming to the Saloon as much!
That's probably a good thing, but it's always a little sad to lose a regular...
Have I told you Haley and I are sisters? Strange, isn't it?
I have a secret hobby, but I won't say any more.
Maybe I'll show you some day.
This world is full of spirits and magic... Some don't believe me, but I know it's true.
I can see it in your eyes... you believe in the other world, like me.
I wish Haley would get a job or at least contribute to cooking and cleaning.
I think she's hoping to marry someone rich.
I have to say, now that Haley's gone I've had a much easier time keeping things in order.
There's good people in this town who just can't seem to find happiness. It makes me sad.
Working in the saloon, I hear first-hand about everyone's problems.
Now that you have a sheep, you'll be able to make cloth! That'll open up a whole new world of tailoring possibilities. Just wait and see.
Oh, that's beautiful... I have a friend who would love that! But she lives far from here...
If you open your heart to the sun, you can feel a loving energy inside of you.
It's nice to be on this side of the bar for once!
Are you having fun, ? You need to remember to take breaks now and then too!
is lost in the music.
Oh, I like this place! It's full of parrots!
Ah... my lungs feel perfect.
Can you feel it? The ocean has a profound healing energy.
I like making my own clothes, but it's not easy to get cloth.
And it's such a long trip to the city.
Do you ever think about the texture of fabric, ? Each texture has a distinct personality... feel my dress... see?
... I'm ready to give you a second chance. I still have faith that there's a good person inside of you.
If I wasn't so busy I'd come help you on the farm!
But Gus would be upset if I had another job...
You know, I'm sure Gus would understand if I wanted to leave the Saloon someday.
There's so much out there, I can't stay a barmaid forever.
Haley is a picky eater. It's so hard to cook for her.
Haley and I get along much better now that she's moved out. I look forward to her visits!
Eating healthy is very important to me. I want to live a long and active life.
Don't overwork yourself or you might end up in Harvey's clinic!
Hi !
It's around this time of year that my good friends visit the region... I mean the parrots!
Hi, ! We've become decent friends, haven't we?
That's fine with me. You're a cool guy.
I'm glad.
This may sound weird, but I've always been certain this would happen.
I consider the bees and butterflies to be my special friends!
Hello there, .
I feel lazy today.
I feel bad for Linus. People judge him, but he's just living a different lifestyle.
I wish everyone could learn to be accepting of others.
It doesn't rain much in summer, does it?
That just means more watering work for you, huh?
Or do you enjoy the sunny weather?
Do you raise sheep in your barn? You can turn their wool into beautiful bolts of cloth!
You'll need a loom, though. You can make them yourself if you know the crafting recipe.
This house was left in our care by my parents. They've been traveling the world for the last two years.
We have no idea when they'll be back.
I enjoy living here, though. It's a beautiful area and the town is nice.
I hope you're farming in a sustainable way. The valley's ecosystem is fragile!
How do I know? I have a strong gut-feeling!
Sometimes the flowers speak to me... each one has a different story to tell!
I work part-time at Gus' saloon. It pays the bills.
I'm just working at Gus' to make ends meet... but my real passion is tailoring.
I made these clothes from scratch, see?
Oh, hi... It's nice of you to visit me like this.
You know, ... I think the future looks bright for both of us.
I've heard rumors of rare and powerful magic rings, forged long ago by forgotten civilizations. I'm not sure if it's true or just a fairy tale.
You catch fish? I just hope you treat the poor things humanely.
Every critter deserves our respect, even the slimy ones.
Have faith... every day you're taking one more step on the path of your destiny.
Hey, .
I always knew we would become good friends. It was written in the stars!|Hi, .
I always knew we'd become close like this...
If I wasn't so busy I'd help you dig around in that cave by the lake.
I bet there are some powerful crystals inside there.
Be careful an icicle doesn't fall on your head!
Be careful an icicle doesn't fall on your head! I wouldn't want you to get hurt!
Do you know how to cook 'Bean Hotpot'?
I like that dish quite a bit.:Emily:207
It's hard to get fresh ingredients in the winter, huh?
Hi!
...Yes?
My sister and I might fight sometimes, but I would really miss her if she left.
I think she'll become a very nice young lady some day... Don't tell her I said that.
So, is there anything you want to talk about?
Say hi to my sister for me! And remind her to visit me tomorrow.
It must be so cold for the poor fish.
I wonder if any fish hibernate? Maybe I should ask Demetrius.
Oh, hello !
You must be getting very good at farming by now, huh?
I bet you're an excellent farmer by now!
I think my hair is frozen solid...
Haley and I aren't made for such a big house. It's a hassle to keep it clean.
Ah well. I really shouldn't be complaining.
Your farmhouse seems nice and cozy.
Can you believe we're about to move in together? I've never lived with anyone but my family.
It's... exciting.
I always knew something important would happen between us... I just never thought it would be this!
The parrot is excited too.
Hey, honey... before you get to work today, do you have a moment?
I've been working on something special for you... but I need a little help finishing it.
It's a secret, so I can't tell you what it is... but could you bring me 200 pieces of fiber?
That's all I need! Just bring the 200 fiber by when you have a chance... no rush!
No peeking! You'll see the end result soon.
Hi ! Good morning!
You seem to be doing well... the farm looks great!
So... you've been here a while, and I'm sure you've acquired some 'cloth' by now... right?
Well, did you know that you can use cloth to tailor all kinds of clothes? All you need is access to a sewing machine...
And I happen to have one at home! Feel free to swing by and use it any time.
To start tailoring, you'll need a piece of cloth and a secondary item. Experiment and see what unique styles are out there!
Good morning, .
I just remembered... I have a sewing machine at my old place!
If you ever feel like making clothes, you should swing by and check it out.
I'm going to have a lot of fun seeing you in all kinds of different outfits!
You can now access Emily's sewing machine!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917601/f Emily 3500/O Emily/n emilyFiber/A emilyFiber/t 2000 2400/p Emily
Entries.DialogueText: Welcome home, . I hope you had a nice day.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917601/f Emily 3500/O Emily/n emilyFiber/A emilyFiber/t 2000 2400/p Emily_1
Entries.DialogueText: So... I finished that secret project I was working on.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917601/f Emily 3500/O Emily/n emilyFiber/A emilyFiber/t 2000 2400/p Emily_2
Entries.DialogueText: It's a brand new hand-made outfit for you!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917601/f Emily 3500/O Emily/n emilyFiber/A emilyFiber/t 2000 2400/p Emily_3
Entries.DialogueText: I've always loved sewing and making crafts... So I thought it'd be nice to make you something by hand. I had a lot of fun!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917601/f Emily 3500/O Emily/n emilyFiber/A emilyFiber/t 2000 2400/p Emily_3_1
Entries.DialogueText: I hope it fits right... and that the fiber isn't too itchy.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917601/f Emily 3500/O Emily/n emilyFiber/A emilyFiber/t 2000 2400/p Emily_3_2
Entries.DialogueText: There's boots, a hat, a shirt, and pants! It's a complete outfit.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917601/f Emily 3500/O Emily/n emilyFiber/A emilyFiber/t 2000 2400/p Emily_4
Entries.DialogueText: Now, when you wear those clothes, you'll think of me... and you'll know I'm here waiting for you to come home safe... okay?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917601/f Emily 3500/O Emily/n emilyFiber/A emilyFiber/t 2000 2400/p Emily_alt
Entries.DialogueText: Received Emily's Magic Hat, Emily's Magic Boots, Emily's Magic Shirt, and a matching set of pants!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:FarmHouse/3917601/f Emily 3500/O Emily/n emilyFiber/A emilyFiber/t 2000 2400/p Emily_implied
Entries.DialogueText: Time for bed.
You're being childish, Haley. I do the vast majority of work in this house, and you know it.
${He
She}$ has a name, you know.
*sigh*... I'm really sorry to involve you in this, . Haley is complaining because I asked her to clean under the cushions.
Thanks, . That was a great solution.
Great... everyone has their stone.
Now, close your eyes, and take slow, deep breaths. Focus on your lungs.
Visualize the pure energy flowing into your body with every breath.
And when you exhale, feel all the tension and negative energy flowing out, leaving you more and more relaxed with every breath.
Now, open your heart to the vibrational frequency of your stone. Do you feel anything?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019
Entries.DialogueText: Th... That night in the tent... you whispered such sweet things to me in the dark...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019_1
Entries.DialogueText: Now I have to face each day knowing it was all a lie.
Why are you here?
That reminded me of something.
Even the tiniest, blandest, simplest light holds a wonderful secret.
Nowwwwww I know why you're here. It's a sign. Hahaha!
... There's something special about ...
Our destinies will intersect...
Mui-wah
Muuui-wah
Come in, ! I want to show you something.
It's my secret hobby... I've been practicing for months.
Now, sit back, relax, and allow yourself to be carried away to a better place... okay?
213 null 213 25 event_dance1 213 -50 event_dance2 213 25 event_dance1#(Say nothing and do a slow clap)
Phew... that was quite a workout...
I haven't been this sweaty since I ordered the pepper platter at Abigail's graduation fiesta!
...Well, I'd better take a shower. Thanks for watching.
Don't tell anyone about the dance. That was for your eyes only.
Do you really expect us to believe that? You're just digging yourself into a deeper hole...
*sigh*... I guess I'll just do it, then...
Welcome to clothing therapy!
You're probably wondering... what is clothing therapy?
I'll try to explain.
Well, that went very well!
I just hope this experience helps everyone break out of their shells a bit.
So many of us are struggling with personal issues... things holding us back from living how we want.
It's important to me that everyone has a free and happy life... so I came up with a new kind of therapy to help people achieve that.
It's based on the amazing power of self-expression. Self-expression is a wonderful healing tool, did you know that?
Behind this curtain, you'll find racks and racks of clothes. There's endless options to choose from.
Your job is simple: find the outfit that truly speaks to you, and put it on.
Feel confident in yourself and your choice. You all have a unique style to share with the world!
Shane, you're up first!
Ah, . You're just in time. Just observe and keep an open mind... okay?
Shane, it's a new side of you we've never known about. That's great!
Now, go outside with confidence and show the world!
Okay, everyone gets a turn!
Clint? You're up!
Beautiful!
Lookin' sharp!
Very nice!
Awww, cute!
I've got a linguini with mushroom cream sauce for Mr. .
I've got a kale and walnut salad for the lady.
...and a grilled steak for Alex.
And a grilled steak for the gentleman.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun
Entries.DialogueText: Hi Clint, what can I get for you tonight?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun_1
Entries.DialogueText: Hi .

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun_2
Entries.DialogueText: Yes, Clint?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun_3
Entries.DialogueText: Hi, Shane! Here's your beverage.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun_4
Entries.DialogueText: It's fine! Thanks for asking, Shane!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun_4_1
Entries.DialogueText: Do you have any new chicken stories for me?
Sorry, Caroline. Could you excuse me for a minute?
Sure, Clint! That sounds fun!
Okay! See you tomorrow!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H
Entries.DialogueText: It... It was a lot of fun...
Ah... Another beautiful day in Pelican Town.
Oh no! You poor thing!
Your wing's broken.
Oh, you're a bit different than the others, aren't you? Just like me...
Don't worry. I'll nurse you back to health, little one. Everything will be alright.
My friends!
Emily took the injured parrot into her home and bandaged the wing.
He's all set up in her room. But as a token of respect, she didn't give the bird a name.
I am!
Yes!
I thought we had something special... I guess I was wrong.
I thought we had something special... You said you wouldn't leave me for anything. I guess that was a lie.
But... But... Isn't soda unhealthy? You promised me...
...Clint?
What a productive day... I got some great footage.
Well, this is fun, isn't it?
Kind of spooky, actually...
Heh... it's chilly out here...
A bear! I hope he's not hungry...
Oh... the other sleeping bag is still outside...
No way am I going back out there!
Um.. ? You don't mind sharing a sleeping bag with me, do you?
This is a special moment...
I've always known I would be standing here with you, someday. I've always felt it in my heart.
Now, it's all come true."/pause 500/speak Emily "The world is a mysterious and special place..."
You know, I would've made a pretty good clown. I think I missed my calling.
Sandy traveled all the way from Calico Desert to be here today.It's not very often that I get to see her!
When Sandy and I were kids, we joked about running away from it all and joining the circus.I don't think we would've actually gone through with it, but it's fun to imagine.
Do you like the jack-o-lanterns? I carved them myself.
*giggle* I knew you'd find your way here.
Ooooh. You found the secret entrance too!
I've been up since dawn coloring eggs... it's always my favorite part of the season.
This year I sewed little pants and hats for some of the eggs. They look adorable!
Whoo... I'm stuffed. Hey, have you tried the red jelly yet?
Hey, I was wondering what you were up to!
Oh, hey! This year I'm giving my sister competition for the flower queen title.I've been working on my choreography!
unresponsive.
*pant* It might be time to take a break soon.We should dance together later, okay?
*pant* It's all in the hips!I think I need to take a break soon. I'm getting sweaty!
Look out there, at the endless sea. Deep underwater, all kinds of life forms are moving around in the dark.Eerie, isn't it?
Hey, there you are!The ocean holds so many secrets and wonders. It's truly amazing.
The moonlight jellies possess a deep blue aura of mystery...There's more to them than meets the eye.

'! What are you hoping to find under the spirit tree?_A new watering can._All work and no play? That's not very fun._A jug of spiced mead._Ooo... that sounds nice. Make sure to give me a taste._A pair of stylish boots._I see. That would be a great gift!'
When Haley and I were kids, we always used to decorate cookies at this festival.We should do it sometime! You can't let good traditions die out.
Look! It's the 'Winter Star'!Oh, my mistake. It's just a decoration!
Wow, this snowman needs a makeover. Who made this?
Ta da! It's you!What? You don't see the resemblance? I think it's perfect!
A snowman has to look the part! Isn't the top hat and scarf stylish?
This gift is fabulous! Thank you so much!
Thank you! I'm feeling a positive energy from this gift.
Sorry, . I don't like this.
This gift has a strong negative energy. I can't stand it.
Thanks!
